bonus_milestones.header: Additional bonuses for round invitee summs
bonus_milestones.subheader: There are some milestones that will let you to get additional bonuses... just check below, they're worth it.

reward_milestones.header: The more you give – the more you get
reward_milestones.subheader: The more users you invite — the more DEC you’ll get as a reward. Reward sum depends on total amount of users have been invited from you and passed all 3 steps to get on board.

stats.reward_for_referral: You’ll receive +{{reward}} DEC for each referral after they will complete all steps.

referral_stats.steps: Invite your friends with a link and get referral reward after they will do 3 easy steps: sign up, install Decentr browser and earn {{uPDVToEarn}} uPDV.

user_page.wallet_address_copied: The wallet address was copied successfully

banned.label: Banned
banned.tooltip: You are banned. Please contact Decentr support team

user_menu_page.delete_hint:
We’ll clean all the cookies and other information connected with your account.
You’ll be able to recover your account with seed phrase.

delete_confirmation.content: You’ll lose your account information, PDV rate, and cookies and won't be able to restore it. The only thing you can restore with the seed phrase is the account name.
delete_confirmation.title: Delete your account?

user_menu_page.lock_hint: You’ll be able to unlock your account using your password.
user_menu_page.restore_seed_hint: Restore seed phrase using your password
